name: Canyon Run
descriptionText: The Empire's work on Tatooine has taken a turn for the worse. Intelligence indicates that they have established a base in the Jundland Wastes, using the forbidding presence of the Tusken Raiders as a natural defense. This base needs to be infiltrated and its operations data stolen before it's too late...

name: Hunted Down
descriptionText: In response to a growing Imperial threat on Tatooine, Han Solo recently took on a mission to investigate the Rim planet. But now that communication with Solo has been lost for weeks, Command has become concerned that his past may have finally caught up with him...

name: Past Life Enemies
descriptionText: No one in the Rebellion seems to know the origin of Biv Bodhrik's vengeful hatred for stormtroopers, just that he is the most ruthless and efficient stormtrooper killer available. So, when operatives lost contact with C-3PO during recon of a potential stormtrooper outpost on Tatooine, Biv was on the top of the list to complete the mission...

name: Shady Dealings
descriptionText: Saska Teft's black market gadgeteering trade may have its shady side, but it also comes with the fringe benefit of many underworld contacts. When it comes to information brokering, she is as efficient as R2-D2 is with a computer terminal. It only makes sense that Command wants them both to investigate Imperial rumors on Tatooine, Saska's home turf...

name: Fire in the Sky
descriptionText: A Star Destroyer orbiting Tatooine foreshadows strong operations against the Rebels. The recent arrival of Slave I has made a Rebel mission against this ship almost imperative...
bonusText: After the heroes resolve any other side mission, discard this card and the Empire receives the listed reward. If the heroes lose this mission, increase the threat level of the next mission by 1. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 50 credits per hero to prevent this.
imperialRewardText: +1 Threat Level for the next mission

name: Infiltrated
descriptionText: The Empire has been hunting Luke Skywalker's location for months. Now a Star Destroyer is closing in on his hideout on Sullust, hoping to capture the Rebellion's hero.
bonusText: After the heroes resolve any other side mission, discard this card and the Empire receives the listed reward. If the heroes lose this mission, increase the threat level of the next mission by 1. During the Rebel Upgrade stage, the Rebel players can decide to spend 50 credits per hero to prevent this.
imperialRewardText: +1 Threat Level for the next mission
